full_text:
35. Jane Doe was then able to get dressed, leave the room and go back down the stairs and into the kitchen. Epstein, Robson and Kellen were waiting for Jane Doe. Epstein paid Jane Doe $300. Ms. Robson was paid $200 by Epstein for bringing Jane Doe to him. Ms. Robson brought Jane Doe home.

WHEREFORE, Plaintiff Jane Doe, by and through her Mother, as parent and natural guardian, demands judgment against Defendants Jeffrey Epstein, Haley Robson, and Sarah Kellen for compensatory damages, treble damages under Florida Statute section 772.104, costs and attorney's fees under Florida Statute section 772.104, and such other and further relief as this Court deems just and proper. Further, Plaintiff reserves the right to amend this Complaint to add a claim for punitive damages pursuant to Florida Law.

JURY TRIAL DEMAND

Plaintiffs demand a jury trial in this action.

Dated: March ____, 2008

Respectfully submitted,

BOCC-LEOPOLD, P.A.
3925 PGA Blvd., Suite 200
Palm Beach Gardens, FL 33410
Phone: 561-694-6300
Fax: 561-697-2383

By: _________________________________
THEODORE J. LEOPOLD
Florida Bar No.: 705608

Page 9 of 9

07/26/17 Page 82 of 131 Public Records Request No.: 17-295

DOJ-OGR-00030549
